name: Document Query
description: Interact with a document by asking queries and getting them answered

appStages.name: Introduction
Document Query
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\n    \u003ch3\u003eDocument Query\u003c/h3\u003e\n  \u003c/div\u003e\n  \n  \u003csection\u003e\n    \u003cul\u003e\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Upload a PDF file and use the document query area to ask any queries related to it..\u003c/li\u003e\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\n  \u003c/section\u003e\n\u003c/div\u003e\n",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html2",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Upload a File",
      "description": "Upload any PDF document you want to run queries over.",
      "customClass": "icon-green transparent m-4",
      "hideLabel": true,
      "tableView": false,
      "storage": "base64",
      "webcam": false,
      "fileTypes": [
        {
          "label": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "fileMinSize": "1KB",
      "key": "file",
      "type": "file",
      "input": true,
      "keyModified": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Destination Path",
              "hidden": true,
              "tableView": true,
              "defaultValue": "data/GENAI/GenAI-Applications/Document-Query/",
              "clearOnHide": false,
              "key": "destinationPath",
              "properties": {
                "for": "file"
              },
              "type": "textfield",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Upload",
              "action": "event",
              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "info",
              "customClass": "float-right rounded btn-outline",
              "tableView": false,
              "key": "read",
              "properties": {
                "for": "file",
                "clearFiles": "true",
                "dirOverwrite": "true"
              },
              "logic": [
                {
                  "name": "Enable Button",
                  "trigger": {
                    "type": "javascript",
                    "javascript": "result \u003d (data[\u0027file\u0027].length);"
                  },
                  "actions": [
                    {
                      "name": "Enable Button",
                      "type": "property",
                      "property": {
                        "label": "Disabled",
                        "value": "disabled",
                        "type": "boolean"
                      },
                      "state": false
                    }
                  ]
                }
              ],
              "type": "button",
              "event": "upload",
              "input": true,
              "keyModified": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "customClass": "m-2",
      "key": "columns",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Enter a Query",
      "autoExpand": false,
      "customClass": "transparent m-4",
      "tableView": true,
      "clearOnHide": false,
      "calculateValue": "if(data.userquery \u0026\u0026 !data.userquery.startsWith(\"\\\u0027\")){\n  data.userquery \u003d \"\\\u0027\"+data.userquery+\"\\\u0027\";\n}",
      "key": "userquery",
      "logic": [
        {
          "name": "clear3",
          "trigger": {
            "type": "event",
            "event": "upload"
          },
          "actions": [
            {
              "name": "cleardata3",
              "type": "value",
              "value": "value\u003d\u0027\u0027"
            }
          ]
        }
      ],
      "type": "textarea",
      "input": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Ask",
              "action": "event",
              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "info",
              "customClass": "float-right rounded",
              "tableView": false,
              "key": "search",
              "type": "button",
              "event": "execute",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "customClass": "m-2",
      "key": "columns6",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Query Response",
      "editor": "ckeditor",
      "autoExpand": false,
      "customClass": "m-4",
      "tableView": true,
      "key": "queryResponse",
      "type": "textarea",
      "isUploadEnabled": false,
      "input": true
    },
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv style\u003d\"border-bottom:1px solid #E0E0E0;margin-left:-16px;margin-right:-16px;\"\u003e\u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html3",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Back",
              "action": "event",
              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "secondary",
              "customClass": "btn-outline",
              "tableView": false,
              "key": "back",
              "type": "button",
              "event": "back",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Columns",
              "columns": [
                {
                  "components": [],
                  "width": 6,
                  "offset": 0,

                  "currentWidth": 6
                },
                {

                  "currentWidth": 6
                }
              ],
              "key": "columns3",

            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
